afterStart: Hello! Before we begin, please, answer these questions:

infocollect.demand_answer: Before we start, please, answer the questions

age.title: How old are you?
age.mistake: Enter a correct age or a range.

location.title: Enter your city or geolocation or /skip

unactive.press_next: You have not found a person yet, to start the search press /search
unactive.press_stop: You have not started the search, there is nothing to stop

active.press_stop: Chat has ended + report the person
active.companion_response:
The person has stopped the chat 
/search - search for a new person
active.press_next: Chat has ended + report the person
active.press_search: You have already found a person. If you would like to end the chat /stop or find a new person /next

searching.press_next: You have not found a person yet, search continues

report.user_blocked_message: You have been blocked due to an excessive number of complaints until:
report.reason_report: Select a reason for the report:

message.unactive_companion_not_found:
You have not found a person yet
/search - find a person
message.searching_companion_not_found: You have not found a person yet

chat.companion_found:
Person is found
/next - search for a new person
/stop - end dialogue

pay.pay_mistake: Error: Enter your message after the command. /pay Your message

common.you_already_in_bot: You are already in a chat.
common.blacklisted: You have been added to a black list.
common.user_not_in_chat: You have not activated the bot! Use /start to begin
